verses.text: A Song of Degrees. See now! what is so good, or what so pleasant, As for brethren to dwell together?
\add It is\add* as ointment on the head, that ran down to the beard, \add Even\add* the beard of Aaron; That ran down to the fringe of his clothing.
As the dew of Hermon, that comes down on the mountains of Zion: For there the Lord commanded the blessing, \add Even\add* life forever.
